IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HANDLE GIFTS, SCHOLARSHIPS, FELLOWSHIPS, FIXED ASSET CONSTRUCTION AND PURCHASE, FACULTY SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER ACADEMIC EXPENSES FOR RICHMOND COMMUNITY
IRS990.MissionDesc: HANDLE GIFTS, SCHOLARSHIPS, FELLOWSHIPS, FIXED ASSET CONSTRUCTION AND PURCHASE, FACULTY SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER ACADEMIC EXPENSES FOR RICHMOND COMMUNITY
IRS990.Desc: CONTRIBUTIONS TO RICHMOND COMMUNITY COLLEGE FOR DEWITT SERIES GRANT, FORTE BUILDING, AND STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS AND EXPENSES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: DISCRETIONARY ASSISTANCE FOR STUDENT NEEDS AT RICHMOND COMMUNITY COLLEGE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART II, LINE 1H PURPOSE OF GRANT IS TO PROVIDE GIFTS, SCHOLARSHIPS, FELLOWSHIPS, FIXED ASSET CONSTRUCTION AND PURCHASE, FACULTY SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OVERALL ACADEMIC EXPENSE ASSISTANCE TO RICHMOND COMMMUNITY COLLEGE.

THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR CONDUCTED THE INITIAL REVIEW AND COORDINATION WITH THE AUDITOR. THE DRAFT 990 WAS THEN REVIEWED BY THE FOUNDATION'S AUDIT COMMITTEE. FOLLOWING THE REVIEW, THE AUDIT COMMITTEE COMMENTS AND RECOMMENDATIONS WERE PRESENTED, ALONG WITH THE DRAFT 990, TO THE FOUNDATION EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. A COPY OF THE 990 AND AUDIT WAS MAILED TO EACH DIRECTOR FOR COMMENTS AND OBJECTIONS. ABSENT COMMENTS OR OBJECTIONS FROM THE INDIVIDUAL DIRECTORS DURING THE COMMENT PERIOD, THE 990 WAS SIGNED AND SUBMITTED TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AS AUTHORIZED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

DURING ANY MEETING WHERE BUSINESS IS CONDUCTED PARTICIPATING MEMBERS ARE PROVIDED THE OPPORTUNITY TO IDENTIFY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST. THE INDIVIDUAL MAY RECUSE THEMSELVES FROM DISCUSSION AND VOTING OR THE REMAINING VOTING MEMBERS MAY RULE ON THE ISSUE. SUCH ACTIONS ARE RECORDED IN THE MINUTES. DIRECTORS ARE REQUESTED TO REVIEW AND UPDATE THEIR STATEMENTS ANNUALLY, ADDITIONALLY THEY ARE ABLE TO MODIFY THEIR STATEMENTS AT ANY TIME.
THE RC FOUNDATION'S 990'S ARE AVAILABLE ON GUIDESTAR AS WELL AS ON REQUEST.
CURRENTLY THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE IN EITHER PAPER OR ELECTRONIC COPY UPON REQUEST. AS WITH THE 990, THEY ARE ALSO AVAILABLE THROUGH A LINK ON THE RICHMOND COMMUNITY COLLEGE WEBSITE.
SUPPLIES FOR STUDENT AMBASSADORS THAT HELP OUT AT COLLEGE EVENTS.
